comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called The Painter Abroad, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 57545119@N04
comment._content: Thank you for posting.  I've numerous oil paintings and water colors by Ms. Hughes as well as a portfolio of sketches and studies. She was a neighbor of my Uncle, reportedly in Park La Brea (Los Angeles), but I had no idea what she looked like.
